Eric Enomamien Aghimien bụ onye nduzi Naijiria, onye na-emepụta ihe, onye na-ede ihe nkiri na onye nchịkọta akụkọ. Ihe nkiri izizi ya, A Mile from Home meriri ihe nrite na 2014 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards na 10th Africa Movie Academy Awards.
A mụrụ Eric Aghimien na Benin City, Edo State ma bụrụ nwa nke anọ n'ime ụmụ asaa

Mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị, ọ malitere ise ihe na-atọ ọchị ma na-ere otu ihe ahụ nye ụmụ akwụkwọ ibe ya. Ọ gara Immaculate Conception College, Benin City na Auchi Polytechnic, Edo State, Nigeria. Eric nwere onyinye nka nke gụnyere; ịbụ abụ, ịkpụzi na ise ihe
Ihe ntụrụndụ ya kachasị ukwuu kemgbe ọ bụ nwata bụ; ikiri ihe nkiri ma e wezụga igwu mmiri na bọọlụ.
O nwetara National Diploma na Science Laboratory Technology n'afọ 2005. Mgbe ọ na-enweta diplọma ya, ọ bụ onye otu egwu a na-akpọ Da TED
Mgbe National Diploma ya gasịrị, Eric kpebiri ịchụso ọrụ na ntụrụndụ.

N'afọ 2006, Aghimien si Benin kwaga Lagos wee kpebie ịchụso ọrụ ihe nkiri. Ọ malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya na 2007 na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọzụzụ kọmputa ebe ọ mụtara otu esi eji kọmputa, imepụta ihe osise na nhazi vidiyo. Eric chọrọ ịmụ ime ihe nkiri na mba ofesi mana enweghị ike ịnakọta ego zuru ezu iji wee zụọ onwe ya

Ọ gara n'ihu na mmụta ya site n'inye nkuzi n'ịntanetị.
Eric guzobere Hills Pictures Movie Academy na 2008 nke na-enyere ndị na-abịa aka ịchọpụta, zụlite ma gosipụta nkà ha.

N'afọ 2011, o mere ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke akpọrọ Heckto nke a họpụtara maka Best Use of Special Effects na Best Actor na 2012 International Short Film Festival.
Aghimien mekwara ihe nkiri mbụ ya A Mile from Home, ihe nkiri ihe nkiri, nke nwetara nyocha dị mma.
